name: Rise of Heroes (itch)
description:
{Currently in Testing}

Available Versions - Windows/Android

I have decided to open the game for all public testing purposes. I feel there is no better way to go through testing then having more people play! (Keep in mind this is not complete, there is no storyline.) This is just the core of the game with some added content. 

Rise of Heroes is currently a Single Player 2D RPG - There is plans to make it multiplayer in the works which will be Cross Platform. Rise of Heroes will also be available for Android via Play Store. This is completely free to play without any pay wall

I am including the APK for people who prefer to play on mobile!

If you do donate - All proceeds will go to further development of this and another project in planning. (All In-Game purchases will also be used for the same)

All of the fun in a 2D-Rpg packed into one game.

As of right now, this has all of the basic functions of a Action/Adventure 2D RPG.

Character Customization - You are in full control on how you want to build your character. currently there's 3 paths you can take, or more. depends on how  you want to build.

Stats Attribute Modifier - Put your stat points anywhere you want. There's no limits!

10 Maps - This will give you a good start for the feel of how this is going. Plenty more will be made as the game grows.

100+ Items - Just to get you started.

Inventory, Equipment - Can't have a RPG without these features.

Spells - still a WIP. there are 3 types with 2 tiers currently.

Crafting - Several things can be crafted to make more powerful items.

Achievements - Explore and gain.

Shops - Buy from the shops and Sell anything within the game... for a price!

There's also a Discord server you may join if you wish to discuss the game, features, addons you would like to see, bugs. or just anything.
